Class PlayBoard.BoardPit

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape
        • javafx.scene.shape.Polygon
          • Hexxagon.View.PlayBoard.BoardPit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Enclosing class:
    PlayBoard

    private static class PlayBoard.BoardPit
extends javafx.scene.shape.Polygon
    Instances of this class implements a graphical component on board.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Sandor Kalmanchey
